what is MEDIFAIR? Medifair is a website project created by Alan Lu and Seeun Kim. With the goal of aligning with PowerSTEMHacksâ€™s mission of combating disparities in the medical world, Medifair helps to support this goal by improving organizational access to medical insurance or other legal resources.

Along with a future task managing system to help disadvantaged communities juggle complex insurance processes and official legal statuses, Medifair aims to make the system of legal procedures easier for all minorities and communities alike. created with love and sleepless nights
